sentence.Network_en: Leaders of eight Latin American countries are meeting in Caracas, Venezuela, today.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉美8个国家的领导人今天在委内瑞拉的加拉加斯会晤。

sentence.Network_en: The meeting was called in response to a request from Venezuela.
sentence.Network_cn: 应委内瑞拉的要求召开了这次会议。

sentence.Network_en: In Venezuela he got the golden end.
sentence.Network_cn: 在委内瑞拉,他可是时来运转,得心应手.
